name: The Battlefield
description:
This is my submission for the the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022); the theme is "Death is only the beginning".

Code is available at: https://github.com/Ste-Gar/The-Battlefield
